alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 10:11PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Thomas and northeastern Sherman Counties through 1000 PM MDT/1100 PM CDT/... At 910 PM MDT/1010 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Brewster, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. Torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brewster. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 29 and 46. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall with this storm may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
